revised_title: Synthesis and Properties of Ethylic Ethomethoxalate and Ethomethoxalic Acid
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to synthesize a new ether, ethylic ethomethoxalate, by reacting oxalic ether with iodides of methyl and ethyl. They also produced ethomethoxalic acid from the ethomethoxalate of barium. The new ether and acid were characterized by their physical and chemical properties, and their potential applications in further chemical reactions were discussed.
